short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Official Browser Addon for AutomationAgency.com users

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Access your team of heroes and request new tasks quickly and easily from any website without needing to open your email or log in to the Web Portal.

You need an active account with Automation Agency to be able to use this chrome extension.
